traits.name: Keen Senses
description: The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

traits.name: Spell Sense
description: The tressym can sense the presence of magic within 30 feet.
This sense detects active spells, magical effects, and illusions, but not their exact nature or school.

traits.name: Companion Bond
description: The tressym acts on its master's initiative. It obeys verbal commands (no action required).
If the master is incapacitated, the tressym prioritizes warning allies, evasion, and disrupting hostile spellcasters.

traits.name: Feline Agility
description: The tressym can move through a hostile creature's space without provoking opportunity attacks, provided it does not end its movement there.
